code: import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const role=localStorage.getItem('role');const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('role');navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"}),!token&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"}),!token&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:"Register"}),token&&role==='admin'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",children:"Admin"}),token&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"btn",children:"Logout"})]});};export default Navbar;
